channel.title: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)
channel.description: can any1 help me with daggers? like how to put it in the shield position and keep it there so it wont go with the weapon? :\

item.title: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Err… Is there even a weapons one? Because my d defender kicks ass equipped with d scimmy, but I’d like my defender in shields hand, not just the slot… And I have everything but weapons thingy…

Read full topic
item.source: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)

item.title: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)

Before That Delete It From The Weapons Thing… I Think you will get errors if you dont…

item.source: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)

item.title: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Wildcat_240:

in item.java look for public static int shields[] = and add the objects id in there. Add it in all of the public static int shields[] ='s though because there’s more than one (at least in mine there is)

Read full topic
item.source: Making defenders (daggers in shield place and have it in the shield place)
